Name: Ulkar
description:
Ulkar is a 41-year-old lady. She is an IDP who, at the moment, lives in Bilasuvar region, which is a settlement for refugee people. Ulkar is married and has 2 sons and 2 daughters. Her family isn't large. She is taking care of her family and also her elder parents.

Ulkar has a good reputation in the local market. At this age, she has been successful in the local bazaar. She grows some vegetables and fruits. People see her as an honest, intelligent and hard-working lady. Ulkar's job is more dependant on people who have high demand for fresh natural fruits and vegetables. There are many traditional dishes which consist of vegetables like potatoes, cabbage, tomatoes and egg-plants. People prepare dolmas,  bozbash and other meals with them.

Ulkar is a very hard-working and energetic lady. She wants to become successful and to meet the family's needs in a better way. To do this, she plans to improve her business. She is planning to buy new seeds and fertilizers. She requires a 1,800 AZN loan. KIVA lenders should support her.
